offlinechess

Class AbstractPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • offlinechess.AbstractPiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class AbstractPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent any chess piece
